1.title: 3D Urban Analytics
1.text: Techniques that use highly-accurate 3D geometry data to enable interactive urban analytics from a new perspective, and allow domain experts to mitigate important issues facing cities today.

2.title: Data structures for interactive visual analytics of large data
2.text: Data structures to drive interactive visual analysis of large data, both temporal and spatiotemporal.

3.title: Neural networks
3.text: Models to predict urban properties, such as commuting flow and built environment similarity.

4.title: Large-scale Data Analysis
4.text: Methods for the analysis of large spatiotemporal data sets.
